sentences.en: a legal wrangle between the company and their suppliers
sentences.cn: 这家公司与各供货商之间长期的法律纠纷

sentences.en: After a brief wrangle in the bankruptcy courts, Britain's Barclays has taken over Lehman's American operations.
sentences.cn: 在破产法庭上简单争执之后, 英国的巴克莱银行接管了雷曼在北美的所有业务.

sentences.en: Don't wrangle with others over trifles.
sentences.cn: 别为一些琐事与别人争吵.

sentences.en: Every time we play , excitement at first, and wrangle the end, always.
sentences.cn: 每次跟他游戏, 总是会以开心开始, 争吵结束.

sentences.en: He was involved in a legal wrangle with the Health Secretary.
sentences.cn: 他卷入了与卫生大臣的法律纠纷之中。

sentences.en: He will give in to his opponent's claim rather than wrangle over a disputed point.
sentences.cn: 他会向对手的要求让步,而不会因争议点而大声争论.

sentences.en: I don't want to get into a wrangle with the committee.
sentences.cn: 我不想同委员会发生争执.

sentences.en: In political terms, he will “own” health care: suddenly every shortcoming in America’s system—each delayed appointment, insurance wrangle or botched operation—will be his fault.
sentences.cn: 在政治谈判中，他“拥有”医疗：美国政府系统突然出现的每个缺点，都将是他的错误——每次约定的推迟、保险的争论、行动的修补。

sentences.en: The bar keeper threw them out, but they continued to wrangle on down the street.
The same reason that makes us wrangle with a neighbour causes a war betwixt princes.
sentences.cn: 两国之间发生战争的原因,和我们和邻居发生争吵的原因是相同的.

sentences.en: The two friends wrangle and now they don't speak to each other.
sentences.cn: 那两个朋友争吵后,现在不再和对方说话.

sentences.en: The two of them began to wrangle the moment they got talking.
sentences.cn: 他们两人一谈就顶牛儿.

sentences.en: The two sides have spent most of their time wrangling over procedural problems.
sentences.cn: 双方花了大部分的时间争论程序上的一些问题。

sentences.en: The wrangle between the school and the local council has gone on for two years.
sentences.cn: 学校和当地市政会之间的纷争已经持续两年了.

sentences.en: They were involved in a long legal wrangle over payment.
sentences.cn: 他们在付款问题上陷入长期纠纷.

sentences.en: They were involved in a long legal wrangle.
sentences.cn: 他们陷入长期的法律纠纷中.

sentences.en: U two have an hour's wrangle for lack of money when wanted.
sentences.cn: 如果没钱的时候你们为钱而争吵,那么有钱了以后你们还是为钱而争吵.

trans.tran_cn: 争论, 争吵, 口角
trans.tran_en: to argue with someone angrily for a long time
